name: ZYBORK
description:
ZYBORK is a wacky 2D platformer where you play as a grumpy robot mechanic that can bounce off of walls! Navigate a space ship as you avoid Zpikes (no that is not a typo) to reach the failing engine (how thrilling!).

Features of this game include:
-3 ZONES to play through
-Medals
-HILARIOUS (subjectively) cutscenes
-No romantic subplots
-Probably way too simplistic sound design!

I hope you enjoy my wacky little game!
